snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 347: SAGE 5 - Event the Game (SAGE2002)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: SAGE 5 - Event the Game (Sonic Amateur Games Expo) - SAGE2002
Main Credit: SAGE
Gobo Credit: Diablo (Diablohead)
Kitsua Credit: SAGE Staff
Sledge Credit: SAGE
Spikes Credit: Jamie Bailey
Show Organizer: LuckettX 
Release Date: September 16th, 2002

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Main Download: (This game has too many links to broken or potentially unsafe sites)
Mini Games Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Character Select
00:47 - Entrance Hall
01:01 - Main Hall
01:42 - Cinos Bar
03:14 - AuditoriumSound Room
03:43 - Toilets
04:20 - Mission Room
04:53 - Booth Hall
14:24 - Spikes Gameplay
14:52 - Kitsua Gameplay (Can also fly)
15:32 - Gobo Gameplay
16:12 - Gobo Minigame
18:42 - Kitsua Minigame
20:43 - Sledge Minigame
22:57 - Spikes Minigame (Time Attacked Demo)

NOTES: So today we take a look at something more special.
Is it a fangame? Kinda... What it is, is the SAGE Event from 2002.
To explain it better "Sonic Amateur Games Expo" aka SAGE held their
SAGE 5 event through a Fusion fangame.
Booths and everything else being all inside this "Game"
It is truly a joy and unique but that's just my opinion anyway.
For some of you these Booths "Authors" may look very familiar.
And some I don't even know myself.
Got some minigames in here as well.
There are also Credits and Promo Items but not sure where to access em in-game.
